messages.title: TO GIVE A FINAL SAY ON BREXIT

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Climate crisis is the greatest problem we face. Other parties only offer words. We have the policies to ensure a greener future for all.
Bradford is being left behind. We need to end austerity, ensure public services are well run and services are provided locally by employers paying the living wage.
Our countryside on the South Side of Bradford is under assault from greedy developers. We need planning policies that give more control to our local communities.

issues.environment: The Climate crisis is the greatest problem we face. Other parties only offer words. We have the policies to ensure a greener future for all.

community.content: Our countryside on the South Side of Bradford is under assault from greedy developers. We need planning policies that give more control to our local communities.

endorsements.endorsement: This general election isn't just about Brexit – this is about the country we live in. Only a Green vote will prevent climate chaos, transform Britain, ensure the British people have a final say on Brexit, and elect more Green MPs that you can trust to keep the other parties honest. The time is now – please vote Green. Vote for Matt Edwards

quotes.text: This general election isn't just about Brexit – this is about the country we live in. Only a Green vote will prevent climate chaos, transform Britain, ensure the British people have a final say on Brexit, and elect more Green MPs that you can trust to keep the other parties honest. The time is now – please vote Green. Vote for Matt Edwards

examples: The Climate crisis is the greatest problem we face.
Our countryside on the South Side of Bradford is under assault from greedy developers.
Bradford is being left behind. We need to end austerity, ensure public services are well run and services are provided locally by employers paying the living wage.
The Climate crisis is the greatest problem we face. Other parties only offer words. We have the policies to ensure a greener future for all.
Our countryside on the South Side of Bradford is under assault from greedy developers. We need planning policies that give more control to our local communities.
Caroline Lucas MP endorses Matt Edwards.
